name: Snake
description: Colonel i see the weapon disk but there is a problem. They also have the US president! How do you want me te proceed sir?

options.text: You have to stop that disk from reaching the weapon!
The safety of the president must be secured!

name: Colonel campbell
description: The president is not in immediate danger. Get the disk before anything else!

options.text: Continue

name: Colonel campbell
description: The disk can wait the safety of the president must be secured!

options.text: Continue

name: Snake
description: Disk secured sir but, they have loaded the president on a helicopter and are flying away!

options.text: Go back to your car and chase it!
Look if you can find any plane on the base to chase it!

name: Snake
description: Sir, i have the president safely extracted with a fulton balloon! But the disk. They are taking it on helicopter to the weapon.

options.text: Go back to your car and chase it!
Look if you can find any plane on the base to chase it!

name: Colonel campbell
description: Go back to your car and chase it! And Snake, hurry up before it is to late.

options.text: Continue

name: Colonel campbell
description: Search for a plane on the base to chase them!

options.text: Continue

name: Colonel campbell
description: Go back to your car and chase it! And Snake, hurry up before it is to late.

options.text: Continue

name: Snake
description: I followed the helicopter to its destination. I see soldiers clearing the ground so it can land. Sir, how do you want me to proceed.

options.text: Use the rpg in that is in the back of the car.
Wait for it to land, then do everything you can to rescue the president.

name: Snake
description: I found a plane, i must open the hanger door to . . . argh . . . they found me . . . Sir, i don't think i will. . . . . . . . AAaAAgHH. . . . . . . . .

name: Snake
description: I followed the helicopter to its destination. I see soldiers clearing the ground so it can land.  . . . sir, . . . if that disk is in the weapon, ALL WILL BE LOST. How do you want me to proceed.

options.text: Use the rpg in that is in the back of the car.
Wait for it to land, then do everything you can to take it!

name: Colonel campbell
description: Wait for the helicopter to land, then do everything you can to rescue the president!

options.text: Continue

name: Colonel campbell
description: We can not let the USSR have him! In the back of your car is a RPG, use it BLOW UP THAT HELICOPTER!

options.text: Continue

name: Colonel campbell
description: We have NO TIME TO LOSE! in the back of your car is a RPG, use it BLOW UP THAT HELICOPTER! We Cannot let the USSR complete that weapon. The world is in your hands now Snake, . . . don't miss.

options.text: Continue

name: Colonel campbell
description: Wait for the helicopter to land, i want you to take the disk. Snake, i know this is a big risk but that disk is simply to valuable to ignore.

options.text: Continue

name: Snake
description: I see them unloading the president out the helicopter! should i til its dark for a tactical advantage. Or go in now and shoot all the gaurds?

options.text: Wait til nightfall, it will be easier if they cant spot you.
Go in now! we don't know what will happen if we wait to long.

name: Snake
description: I got the helicopter! but what becomes of USA now that it no longer has a president?

name: Snake
description: Sir, i hit the helicopter. There is no way anything has survived in there. All objectives completed sir, shall i return to base?

name: Snake
description: I’m to late, the disk is in the weapon! I will try to destroy the weapon before thy get the chance to use it. Do you have any intel on where i can find a C4 to . . . argh . . . they found me . . . Sir, i don't think i will. . . . . . . . AAaAAgHH. . . . . . . . .

name: Colonel campbell
description: Wait til nightfall, it will be easier if they cant spot you.

options.text: Continue

name: Colonel campbell
description: Go in now! we don't know what will happen if we wait to long.

options.text: Continue

name: Snake
description: I went tru the whole base but didn't find the president. They must have moved him while i waited till dark. Without any intel on where he went i cannot continue the mission, i’m returning to base.
fail_description: Mission failed, you lost the president!

name: Snake
description: all the guards are eliminated, securing the president now! all objectives completed, returning to base.
